response.original_title: GCW Gringo Loco's The Wrld on Lucha 2024 - Cinco de Mayo
response.overview: Watch GCW Gringo Loco's: The Wrld on Lucha 2024 - Cinco de Mayo live on TrillerTV+ straight from White Eagle Hall in Jersey City, New Jersey. The event features the GCW World Title Match where Blake Christian defends the title against Laredo Kid.  Also in the lineup:  Mike Bailey vs Galeno Del Mal Mascarita Dorada vs Joey Janela  Pimpinela Escarlata vs Effy Masha Slamovich vs Dulce Tormenta  Six Man Tag Team Match Aramis, Gravity & Jack Cartwheel vs Los Desperados (Arez, Gringo Loco & Latigo)  *lineup subject to change
response.title: GCW Gringo Loco's The Wrld on Lucha 2024 - Cinco de Mayo
